result.execSummary:
The defendant David Lee Edwards was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Court WAIVED COSTS AND SURCHARGES. Any costs and surcharges that can not be waived are to be paid by 10-13-2015 or, if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David Lee Edwards

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant David Lee Edwards in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  

Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Court sentenced defendant to serve 3 days in the House of Correction with credit for 3 days served FOR A TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

Court WAIVED COSTS AND SURCHARGES.  Any costs and surcharges that can not be waived are to be paid by 10-13-2015 or, if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Attorney Alexis B Stewart in court, defendant David Lee Edwards not in court, in custody.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant NOT produced. Defense counsel requests a plea/sentencing date. Court orders case adjourned to Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION INCLUDING Drug Testing.

Defendant David Lee Edwards in court with attorney Kathleen Judith Osvat.  Defendant David Lee Edwards in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
